Package org.drools.ruleflow.core

Interface Summary
ActionNode Represents an actino in a RuleFlow.
Connection Represents a connection between two nodes in a RuleFlow.
Constraint Represents a constraint in a RuleFlow.
EndNode Represents an end node in a RuleFlow.
Join Represents a join node in a RuleFlow.
MilestoneNode Represents a milestone in a RuleFlow.
Node Represents a node in a RuleFlow.
RuleFlowProcess Represents a RuleFlow process.
RuleFlowProcessValidationError Represents a RuleFlow validation error.
RuleFlowProcessValidator A validator for validating a RuleFlow process.
RuleSetNode Represents a node containing a set of rules in a RuleFlow.
Split Represents a split node in a RuleFlow.
StartNode Represents a start node in a RuleFlow.
SubFlowNode Represents a sub-flow in a RuleFlow.
Variable Represents a global variable used in a RuleFlow.
